text: The Emirate of Transjordan was an emirate of the Middle East from 1907-1946. The Emirate was founded by King Awary al-Samad and E.P. Sawad Khan of the Emirate of Dawghula (which split into north and south Dawghula). Its capital city was named after King Awary and was called Samadgha ul-Hamed. Its national anthem was called “Respect the Constitution that is Transjordan.” Category:20th century in Jordan Category:1907 establishments in Asia Category:1946 disestablishments
title: Emirate of Transjordan
